page.title: 07Farming at Ravendale
page.content: The present owner of Priory Farm has lived ther for 20 years but was born at Top Farm, another farm from our block. There has been a change from mixed farming with a large number of sheep, to arable crops including oil seed rape, wheat, sugar beet and beans. In recent years the owner has taken to keeeping a small amount of beef cattle on nearby land which he rents. College Farm at East Ravendale is mainly a dairy farm but the owner does grow qa percentage of crops. Horses are kept for private riding.
